Package com.hoddmimes.distributor

Interface DistributorConnectionIf

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DistributorConnection
    public interface DistributorConnectionIf
    A DistributorConnectionIf is an interface wrapping an UDP multicast transport i.e. an UDP socket. Over the connections application can publish i.e. send out data in a true one-to-many fashion, to one or more subscribers receiving the data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void close()
      Close and remove the connection.
      long getConnectionId()
      Returns an unique identifier for the connection, application and host.
      long getMcaConnectionId()
      Returns the connection is string which is the multicast (UDP) address << 32 + multicast (UDP) port
      java.lang.String getMcAddress()
      Returns the multicast (UDP) address being used when sending and receiving data.
      int getMcPort()
      Returns the multicast (UDP) port being used when sending and receiving data.

    • Method Detail

      • close

        void close()
        Close and remove the connection. Local subscribers and publishers still being open and associated with the connection will receive DistributorConnectionClosedErrorEvent.html through the event callback routine about the connection being closed. Remote subscribers and publishers being associated to the same UDP multicast address / port will receive an event telling that connection for the particular application/host has closed down i.e. DistributorRemoveRemoteConnectionEvent.html event.

      • getMcAddress

        java.lang.String getMcAddress()
        Returns the multicast (UDP) address being used when sending and receiving data.
        Returns:
        String multicast (UDP) address

      • getMcPort

        int getMcPort()
        Returns the multicast (UDP) port being used when sending and receiving data.
        Returns:
        int multicast (UDP) port

      • getConnectionId

        long getConnectionId()
        Returns an unique identifier for the connection, application and host. The connection is volatile and will be renewed every time the connection is created.
        Returns:
        long connection identifier.

      • getMcaConnectionId

        long getMcaConnectionId()
        Returns the connection is string which is the multicast (UDP) address << 32 + multicast (UDP) port
        Returns:
        connection id string
